mfes.description: A React-based micro frontend for the Open edX discussion forums.

mfes.name: Profile
mfes.description: Open edX micro-frontend application for managing user profile information.

mfes.name: Learning
mfes.description: Front-end for the Open edX course experience, implemented using React and Paragon.

mfes.description: Open edX micro-frontend application for managing user account information.

mfes.name: Ora Grading
mfes.description: Open Response Assessment - Enhanced Staff Grader - Allows graders to easily review, evaluate and grade ORAs

pluginSlots.description: This slot is used for adding content in the Action buttons section of each Course Card.
This slot is used for replacing or adding content around the `CourseList` component. The `CourseListSlot` is only rendered if the learner has enrolled in at least one course.
This slot is used to replace/modify/hide the footer.
This slot is used for replacing or adding content around the `NoCoursesView` component. The `NoCoursesViewSlot` only renders if the learner has not yet enrolled in any courses.
This slot is used for adding content to the right-hand sidebar.
This slot is used to replace/modify/hide the footer.
This slot is used to replace/modify/hide the footer.
This slot is used to replace/modify/hide the footer.
This slot is used to replace/modify/hide the entire learning header.
This slot is used for adding content after the Sequence content section.
This slot is used for adding content after the Unit title.
This slot is used to replace/modify/hide the footer.
This slot is used to replace/modify the IDV Page.
This slot is used to replace/modify/hide the footer.
